description:
Virtual File System for Git - a tool to scale Git for monorepo scenarios.


This release of VFS for Git reverts the addition of credential.azreposCredentialType=oauth to the set of required config settings (added in v1.0.24072.1). Pre-configured values of credential.azreposCredentialType will no longer be overridden.Pull requests
-  Revert "GVFSVerb: Use OAuth credentials by default"
